The Wrath of God

Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Wrath of God
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
With this enchantment, lighting will strike the enemies of the God, no matter where they are. However, the lightning bolts strike most powerfully in provinces where the God has a strong Dominion. In provinces with a high turmoil scale more thunderbolts strike and enemies under water or inside caves are not affected.
Hit chance per month: 2% + 2% * dominion + turmoil (minimum 1% chance). Damage: 9 AN
